head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths TOMPKINS, REXFORD E.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths TOMPKINS, REXFORD E.

block.p: TOMPKINS--Rexford E. The governors, members and staff of The Real Estate Board of New York mourn the passing of Rexford Tompkins, former REBNY governor from 1966 to 1975 and REBNY Chairman from 1970 to 1972. In the mid 1970s, Rex also served as REBNY's President. We extend our sincere condolences to the entire Tompkins family. Stephen M. Ross, Chairperson Steven Spinola, President
